rows.translation: In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.

rows.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ
rows.translation: except those who have faith and do righteous deeds, and enjoin one another to [follow] the truth, and enjoin one another to patience.
rows.transliteration: illal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti watawāṣaw bil ḥaqqi watawāṣaw biṣ ṣabr
